TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件的数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于向事件提供事件值并使你能够为当前请求指定自定义 Windows 标识。 The class is used to supply event values to the event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 可以通过在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**的子例程来访问类的事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 使用当前 构造对象并将其传递给AnonymousIdentification_Creating事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 可以使用提供给 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件的对象的属性, 将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果未在 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件期间为属性指定值, 则使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. 仅当匿名标识为时, 才会引发 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

The anonymous identifier for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件过程中, 可以使用属性将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。You can use the property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 如果未在 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件期间为属性指定值, 则使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. 仅当匿名标识为时, 才会引发 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
